name: Auto Layout Presets
description:
Apply popular auto-layout presets with a single click.


The plugin speeds up your work, especially while designing forms or popular layouts. It also makes all selected objects stretchable which saves time when you need to resize your mockups.


You are able to apply three types of presets:


  • Stretch items horizontally.
  • Stretch items vertically.
  • Set "space between" alignment for items.


You can learn more here.
